metadata.description: Governing operational and safety parameters for the MCRE engine.

recalibration_priority.note: Determines scheduling urgency for model recalibration cycles.

trigger_MRA_delta.note: Maximum allowable rolling average TEDA before MRA (Mitigation/Response Action) is signaled.

MRA_lock_duration.note: Duration threshold must be continuously exceeded to initiate MRA lock-in.

required_schema.note: Mandatory schema version for all incoming ESIC payloads/validation checks.
